summary: TripMate: an end-to-end trip planning app for travelers (solo or groups) where users enter destination and dates to get guided plans (stay, food, routes) generated by an in-app AI agent, with GPS-based guidance and a monetization model via promoted listings/ads from resorts, hotels, and tourist businesses.
architectural_notes: Include an in-app AI agent component to generate personalized trip plans.
Plan for GPS/location services integration for routing and guidance.
Include a paid promotions/ads capability for travel-related businesses (resorts/hotels/tourist places).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- TripMate logo mark, minimal compass + location pin style, earthy palette (tripmate-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide landing hero illustration: traveler with backpack + winding road + mountains, flat vector style, earthy palette (tripmate-hero.dim_1600x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create the TripMate MVP user flow: allow a traveler to enter trip details (trip type: solo or group/bike gang, destination, start date, end date, optional notes/interests) and submit to generate a trip plan.

Implement an in-app “AI agent” experience as a deterministic, on-chain itinerary generator (no external LLM): generate an end-to-end plan that includes a daily schedule, suggested route description (text), suggested stay/food categories, and a packing/checklist section based on trip type and duration.
Add authentication via Internet Identity and basic account model: travelers can sign in to manage their own trips; business owners can sign in to manage their own promoted listings.

Create a promoted listings feature: allow business owners to create, edit, and delete promoted entries (name, category: resort/hotel/restaurant/tourist place, destination/area text, description, contact info, optional promo text). Travelers can browse and filter these listings and see them injected into trip plans as “Sponsored suggestions”.
Frontend UX: build a coherent navigation structure with pages for Home/Landing, Trip Planner (new trip + my trips), Trip Plan detail, Explore Promoted Listings, and Owner Dashboard.

Visual theme requirement: apply a distinctive, consistent travel-themed UI style (avoid blue/purple) across typography, spacing, and components (e.g., earthy palette such as sand/khaki/sage with charcoal text), including a landing hero section introducing TripMate.
Add static generated image assets for branding and UI (logo + simple hero illustration) and render them in the frontend from frontend/public/assets/generated.

new_feature_requests.summary: User trip input: destination and travel dates (support solo and group/bike gang trips)
AI agent that generates an end-to-end trip plan (routes, places to stay, places to eat, itinerary)
GPS/location integration for route guidance/navigation during trips
Business promotions/ads: owners can pay to promote resorts/hotels/tourist places in the app

Implement backend data models and persistence in a single Motoko actor for: user profiles (role: traveler/owner), trips, generated plans, and promoted listings; include query and update methods needed by the frontend.
